did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: E.F. Morse House Drawings and specifications, 1907-1909.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Collection includes photographs, floor plans, topographic surveys, and architectural details of the E.F. Morse House, 101 Orchard Place, Ithaca, New York, designed by Samuel E. Hillger.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Samuel E. Hillger attended Cornell University from 1880-1882.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Collection includes photographs, floor plans, topographic surveys, and architectural details of the E.F. Morse House, 101 Orchard Place, Ithaca, New York, designed by Samuel E. Hillger.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Samuel E. Hillger. Drawings and Specifications, #3907. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
